summary: "A Bug's Life" is a 1998 animated comedy by Pixar. It tells the story of Flik, a misfit ant who seeks help from "tough warriors" to save his colony from grasshoppers. However, he mistakenly brings back a group of circus bugs. Inspired by an Aesop's fable, the film was Pixar's second feature after "Toy Story." It received positive reviews and made a lot of money. The production was not without drama, as Pixar's leaders had a public feud with a rival studio making a similar film.
title: A Bug's Life
